step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position and stretching your arm overhead. Keep that arm straight and feel the resistance.
Excellent! You're keeping your arm overhead. Now, focus on opening your palm and fingers wide.
Great! You're opening your hand wide. Remember to make a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles.
Well done! You made a fist while inhaling. Now, open your hand while exhaling and relaxing, visualizing the fluid moving.
Good start on your second rep! Keep that arm straight overhead and feel the stretch.
Nice work maintaining the overhead position. Remember to open your palm and fingers wide.
You're opening your hand well. Now, make a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles.
Fantastic! You closed your fist while inhaling. Finish by opening your hand while exhaling and relaxing, visualizing the lymph flow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the stretch. Make sure to open your hand wide and then make a fist while inhaling, followed by opening your hand while exhaling.
